name: @imdt-os/build-react-from-ng
description: Allow the usage of ng script to build react project

scripts.postinstall: if [ -d ../../.bin/ ] ; then echo bin dir already exists; else echo creating bin dir; mkdir ../../.bin/; fi ; cp ng-build-react.sh ../../.bin/ng ; chmod 755 ../../.bin/ng

author: iMDT
